DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether treatment with Zactima for up to 18 months will prolong the off-treatment interval in patients who are undergoing intermittent androgen deprivation therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Trial Assessing Zactima Against Placebo in Prostate Cancer Subjects Undergoing Intermittent Androgen Deprivation Hormonal Therapy
